unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer great insight. Dr. Sharma’s biography was truly inspiring. Learning about PV Sindhu's journey from Hyderabad to Olympic glory is fantastic. Detailed stats, like runs scored or km covered, add depth. More stories from kabaddi players & the Pro Kabaddi League are needed! Rs. 5 lakh donation for training? Incredible! Coverage of athletes' 2000 sq ft homes helps readers connect. They show determination beyond IIM degrees.
